name: Dark Year
description:
Dark Year
Fight for your life and return to the northern castle, you assume the role of Marius an officer who must return to the northern kingdom, such a task will not be easy, on your way you will face many challenges, enemies on the prowl and an immeasurable evil await you , will be able to accomplish this task.
A game inspired by retro games, mainly for its pixel-style graphics, with its gameplay focused on modern games with the adoption of a third-person perspective, quick attacks with different weapons and increasingly stronger enemies, venture into this HACK AND SLASH and massacre your opponents.
Leave your feedback because it will be of great help, to improve and improve myself more and more, my goal with the development of this game, firstly was to build a fun game that was challenging at the same time, as a first game I am very happy with the result and looking forward to seeing other players enjoying this experience.
